roleset.name: agglutination of red blood cells
roleset.note: HEMAGGLUTINATION-N NOTES: Comparison to verb-coagulate.01. Relation to microhemagglutination.01. (from hemagglutination.01-n)

role.descr: Agglutinated entity, explicit mention of red blood cells

example.name: hemagglutinate-v
example.text: The ability of some fimbrial types to hemagglutinate erythrocytes was blocked by the presence of mannose...

example.name: hemagglutination-n
example.text: Other red cells commonly used to demonstrate hemagglutination of myxoviruses (adult chicken, guinea pig and human Type O) were not agglutinated.
example.arg: of myxoviruses (adult chicken, guinea pig and human Type O)
